name: Antipersonnel Laser Cannon
Lore: 'Rapid-fire weapon. Requires three power cells to operate. Has no stun setting. Lightweight enough to be stored and then quickly mounted when the need arises.',
Text: 'Use 3 Force to deploy on your transport vehicle. Your warrior present, if aboard, may target a character or creature using 3 Force. Draw destiny. Target hit if destiny +2 > defense value. May fire repeatedly for 2 Force each time.',
